channel.title: Help! small issue
channel.description: How would I make it so for all dice styles, when you click "put dice away" it goes back to just a dice bag? If anyone can help it would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.

item.title: Help! small issue
item.dc:creator: @tigman9 tigman9
item.description:
@tigman9 wrote:

lolol. I figured it out! thanks guys

Read full topic

item.title: Help! small issue
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Kind of what modzilla said. If they click the option on any of the item id’s for the dice, then remove that specific id and add the dice bag.

Sidenote: I lol’d when I read modzilla’s post, because “if player.click dbag1”. Immature but still found it funny.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! small issue
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

in your dice file you have to either code it as a Boolean or do a simple if statement this is pseudo code:
if player.click dbag1
p.getinventory.deleteitem(111, 1); //111 would be 2 x 6sided dice
p.getinventory.additem(112, 1); //112 would be normal dice bag

something along the lines of that, i am not to sure what base you have but thats something along the lines of it. Thats the benefit of learning a server, learning to code

Hope this kinda helped. basdically when you click u need to delete item and add a new item

Read full topic
